name: Pneumatiphobia
description:
Pneumatiphobia is a horror puzzle game where the player will help Yukino, a Japanese college student, to find her missing friend. As you progress on your journey, you will explore the most bizarre and creepy places of Tokyo and have a fateful encounter with supernatural beings. Immerse yourself in this Japanese themed tale, find your friend and unleash the secrets of the supernatural world!

Zen Ghosts is a small production team that consist of 6 Binus University students. Each student has their own roles to fulfill, starting from Vennessa as the Artist, Valenstio and William as the Programmer, Azra Hananto and Hans Geovani Andika as the Game Designer and Reynard Austin as the Project Manager. Zen Ghosts was found under the care of Binus Game Development Club, with the guidance of Christopher Fendika Lee as the Overseer for Zen Ghosts.
